author: Special Correspondent
text:
As always, there has been an overwhelming response to the annual The Hindu Young World Painting Competition.

The finals are to be held in Madurai and Tirunelveli on March 19 and 20 respectively. Participants chosen for the finals have been intimated by e-mail individually.

The information has also been passed on to schools.

For clarifications, participants can contact S. R. Prasath at 9585506050 (for Madurai) and K. Ayyappan at 9344810143 (for Tirunelveli).

Prizes will be distributed at the respective venues for the winners immediately after the competition. The finals will be held at Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer Hall in Madurai on March 19 and Bells Matriculation School in Tirunelveli on March 20. The competition is presented by Thyrocare.

The venue sponsors are Society for Community Organisation Trust in Madurai and Bells Matriculation School in Tirunelveli.
title: Overwhelming response to The Hindu Young World Painting Competition
